TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create the correct MIP data for all the elements for an AirspaceControlArea and the Consumers are able to correctly understand (and display) it.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates message with all elements for an AirspaceControlArea. The Consumers receive the data and process them.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes AirspaceControl (ControlFeature) message elements, for instance Ground Picture > Air Defence. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Control Feature and all attributes and elements are processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer creates the AirspaceControlArea with name XXX_ACACF_263 and fills ALL elements.
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the Control Feature: ESP_ACACF_263
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the AirspaceControlArea that the Producer created.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer creates an update for the object by changing ALL elements.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the AirspaceControlArea and all elements that the Producer created.
